address: Xã Gia Thủy, Huyện Nho Quan, Tỉnh Ninh Bình
thought:
**Identifying the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Gia Thủy"**

Okay, so the user wants to know the current administrative location for "Xã Gia Thủy, Huyện Nho Quan, Tỉnh Ninh Bình".  First things first, I need to confirm the province, which is "Tỉnh Ninh Bình." Now, I'll quickly check for any province-level reorganizations using resolution 60-NQ/TW.  Ah, perfect, it confirms that Ninh Bình remains unchanged, meaning we don't have to worry about province name changes.

Next, I'll focus on the ward itself, "Xã Gia Thủy".  I'll immediately search through other relevant resolutions, specifically looking for "Xã Gia Thủy" within the context of "Tỉnh Ninh Bình".  I'm looking for any information on ward-level adjustments. Excellent, resolution 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15 catches my attention! Looking at line 75, it's clear: "Xã Gia Thủy" along with "Đức Long" and "Gia Tường" are being combined.  They are forming a new unit named "Xã Gia Tường."

Just to be absolutely certain, I'll quickly double-check the "New wards" to confirm "Xã Gia Tường" exists in "Tỉnh Ninh Bình."  And there it is!  `{"ward_code":"14401","ward_name":"Xã Gia Tường","province_name":"Tỉnh Ninh Bình"}` confirms the creation of "Xã Gia Tường."

Therefore, I'm confident in saying that the old "Xã Gia Thủy" in "Tỉnh Ninh Bình" has been reorganized and is now part of the new "Xã Gia Tường" in "Tỉnh Ninh Bình".  The resolution explicitly stating the merger makes this a solid conclusion.

citation.header: 1674/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Ninh Bình
citation.line: 75. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Gia Thủy, Đức Long và Gia Tường thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Gia Tường.
